divs: Sighting Detailsmy dog wanted to play fetch.so I went to the back yard with him and happened to look up and saw what I thought was a plane then as I kept looking.I noticed it had no wings it was silver.but no reflection from the sun it was not cloudy.it made no sound was expecting to hear a roar.but nothing.it was moving fast and not in a line heading n.w. veering to the left.kinda like a missle. 1.I live at 4735 n.e. 78 pl 2.I just looked up for no reason 3.I thought it was a jet liner at frist. 4.silver cylinder traveling like missle veering n.w.not a straight line 5.just coulnt come up with what it was I was looking at.frustrated for one.but I couldnt keep my eyes off it.kinda hurt my eyes from stairing.and I still see it in my mind 6.it disapeared into the horizon
Summary: it had no wings.it was silver cylinder it casted no reflection from the sun.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around August 5th 2009
